dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Hahahaha! Oh my god, you have got to be kidding me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hahahaha! Oh my god, you have got to be kidding me.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: What? What's so funny about snowdrops finally blooming, like, after this crazy winter?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What? What's so funny about snowdrops finally blooming, like, after this crazy winter?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Usually these beautiful delicate primroses blossomed in the Botanical Garden in February and even in January, but due to the snowy and long winter, the flowering was a little delayed,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: "Fenced off the meadow." Are you actually serious? People are that dense?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fenced off the meadow. Are you actually serious? People are that dense?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The meadow with snowdrops has already been fenced off to protect the flowers from damage.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, clearly, they are! It says right here, um, "warning signs do not help." What do you want them to do?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, clearly, they are! It says right here, um, warning signs do not help. What do you want them to do?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unfortunately, warning signs do not help, so we have to fence off the meadow to protect the flowers from trampling.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, what, we're building, like, fortresses around flowers now? It's a botanical garden, it's for people to experience!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, what, we're building, like, fortresses around flowers now? It's a botanical garden, it's for people to experience!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: To experience, yes, not to, like, trample them. Or, you know, pick them into oblivion. They're incredibly vulnerable!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To experience, yes, not to, like, trample them. Or, you know, pick them into oblivion. They're incredibly vulnerable!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is noted that primroses are very vulnerable, so the organization asks to treat them with care, not to walk on lawns and meadows, and especially not to pick flowers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But if they're so delicate, why are they even planting, uh, non-native species there anyway? What's the point?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But if they're so delicate, why are they even planting, uh, non-native species there anyway? What's the point?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Galanthus is not part of the natural flora of Kazakhstan - these are specially planted specimens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That is completely beside the point! Theyâ€™re specially planted specimens. People should still show respect!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That is completely beside the point! They're specially planted specimens. People should still show respect!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Galanthus is not part of the natural flora of Kazakhstan - these are specially planted specimens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, I mean, if it's a "specially protected natural zone," why isn't it, um, all native stuff? Like, focus on the Alatau crocus.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, I mean, if it's a specially protected natural zone, why isn't it, um, all native stuff? Like, focus on the Alatau crocus.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the territory of the Almaty Botanical Garden is a specially protected natural zone of national significance. ... Wild primroses in the foothills of Almaty belong to another species - Alatau crocus.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Because it's a botanical garden, Host_B! It's for, you know, conservation and beauty and education.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Because it's a botanical garden, Host_B! It's for, you know, conservation and beauty and education.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Beauty that you can't even get close to! So you just, like, stare at a fence? That's, uh, quite the attraction.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Beauty that you can't even get close to! So you just, like, stare at a fence? That's, uh, quite the attraction.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Visitors can admire the flowers, but entering the clearing itself is prohibited," said Bayan Kospenbetova, head of the marketing and PR department of the Institute of Botany and Phytointroduction.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, what do you suggest then? Just let people destroy them? It's, it's absolutely unbelievable!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, what do you suggest then? Just let people destroy them? It's, it's absolutely unbelievable!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Maybe don't plant them where people can easily get to them? Or, like, have more staff managing the crowds.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Maybe don't plant them where people can easily get to them? Or, like, have more staff managing the crowds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, just, uh, uproot the entire meadow! Or hire, like, an army of guards for a bunch of primroses. Genius solution, that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, just, uh, uproot the entire meadow! Or hire, like, an army of guards for a bunch of primroses. Genius solution, that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, obviously, fencing it off is, uh, admitting defeat. It looks ridiculous.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, obviously, fencing it off is, uh, admitting defeat. It looks ridiculous.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's protecting something beautiful from, um, utter thoughtlessness. Seriously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's protecting something beautiful from, um, utter thoughtlessness. Seriously.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, put up electric fences then? Go all out, make it a real spectacle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, put up electric fences then? Go all out, make it a real spectacle.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Don't you dare even joke about that, Host_B!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Don't you dare even joke about that, Host_B!
